title: A Harbour goes to France
brief_description: The official British Army and Admiralty film of “Operation Mulberry”, the unique prefabricated harbour which was floated across the English Channel in sections, and erected in a matter of hours on the coast of Normandy during the critical days following D-Day, World War II.
